pages.title: Torchmaster
pages.text: This is a very simple mod, it adds some usefull items like two types of torchs that wil be really helpful. $(br2)First Mega Torch $(br)This Torch prevents mobs from spwaning. $(br2)Second Feral Flare Lantern $(br)This 'torch' Places invisible lights with time in a short range, it's usefull to keep a good looking building.
